subSections.text: [[File:RYAKUJI ma.png|thumb|right|100px|{{w|Ryakuji}} for 魔, a {{w|phono-semantic}} simplification as 广 (radical/semantic) + マ (phonetic “ma” for ''on'' reading), also used for [[摩#Japanese|摩]]; compare [[機#Japanese|機]] and [[議#Japanese|議]].]]
